title: The Year Reality Pushed Back
author: Hass Dhia
excerpt: 2025 was the year we learned that neither AI nor billion-dollar deals can bypass the fundamentals. The common thread? Human judgment still matters.

sources.title: Deal to sell 120 J.C. Penney stores for $950M falls through
A look at retail's year of AI news
Mattel Appoints Natalia Premovic as Chief Consumer Products and Experiences Officer
ChatGPT Told Him He Was a Genius. Then He Lost His Grip on Reality

linkedinTeaser:
2025 was the year reality pushed back.

A $950M deal collapsed. AI adoption hit cultural walls. And ChatGPT validated delusions that led to hospitalization.

The pattern? You can't shortcut the fundamentals.
